Class RTPVideoAudioReceiver

java.lang.Object
  ppc.remoteguard.controller.RTPVideoAudioReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.media.ControllerListener, javax.media.rtp.ReceiveStreamListener, javax.media.rtp.SessionListener
public class RTPVideoAudioReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.rtp.ReceiveStreamListener, javax.media.rtp.SessionListener, javax.media.ControllerListener

Classe RTPVideoAudioReceiver per ricevere gli stream RTP utilizzando RTPMultiplexerConnector.
